messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
{~J1(1.9)}Were you the one{~N}who cut the fence?
{~J1(3.0)}I'm glad you made it.{~N}I was worried about you.{~E}
{~J1(3.6)}You were worried!?{~N}Where did you disappear to?
{~J1(2.1)}I want to know{~N}what's going on here.
{~J1(3.5)}This may sound really off{~N}the wall, but listen to me.
{~J1(3.2)}I haven't gone crazy,{~N}and I'm not fooling around.{~E}
{~J1(3.7)}At first, I thought I was{~N}losing my mind.
{~J1(4.0)}By a world of someone's{~N}nightmarish delusions{~N}come to life...
{~J1(4.2)}I think I'm finally beginning{~N}to understand what that lady{~N}was talking about.{~E}
{~J1(4.6)}Harry.{~N}Hold on a minute.{~N}I don't get it?
{~J1(3.2)}Cheryl is somewhere.{~N}And she needs my help.{~E}
{~J1(2.8)}This whole thing's been{~N}a major blow to you.
{~J1(4.9)}Hungry for sacrifice,{~N}the demon will swallow up{~N}the land.
{~J1(3.9)}And what's more,{~N}the task is almost finished.
{~J1(5.3)}To seal this town to the abyss,{~N}the mark of Samael.
{~J1(3.6)}When it is completed, all is lost.
{~J1(4.6)}Even in daytime,{~N}darkness will cover the sun.
{~J1(5.8)}The dead will walk,{~N}and martyrs will burn{~N}in the fires of hell.
{~J0(3.5)}So what am I supposed to do?{~N}I've got to save Cheryl.
{~J1(3.7)}Stop it before your daughter{~N}becomes a sacrifice.
{~J1(3.5)}and to the center of{~N}the amusement park.
{~J0(4.4)}But if there's a chance{~N}we can save your daughter,{~N}I'm in.
{~J0(3.5)}That creep's sure to show up{~N}at the Amusement Park{~N}pretty soon.
There's a ship's wheel.{~N}Don't worry about that now,{~N}though.{~E}
There's a body stuck{~N}to the bulkhead.{~E}
